attributes.action: Reverse the abolition of the 10% income tax rate band.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrapping the 10% rate band was a real gaffe by the Government, a Labour government at that, which hits the poorest in Society. Many of those affected do not fall within the scope of tax credits or over-65 allowances, so pay considerably more tax from their already low incomes. Mr Brown should 'limit the damage' by admitting the error, and putting it right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
